int Countable::decref (  )  [inherited]

boost::intrusive_ptr< EmpiricalHessianTerm > EmpiricalHessianTerm::getTerm ( boost::intrusive_ptr< SimpleInternalCoordinate >  coord1,
boost::intrusive_ptr< SimpleInternalCoordinate >  coord2 
) [static, inherited]

Given two internal coordinates, configure an empirical hessian class to compute the force constant. For example, if two bonds are passed to getTerm, this would return a BondBond_EmpiricalHessian.

Parameters:
coord1 
coord2 
Returns:
The term to compute empirical hessian force constant

int Countable::incref (  )  [inherited]

bool EmpiricalHessianTerm::matches ( int  id1,
int  id2,
boost::intrusive_ptr< Atom > &  at 
) [protected, inherited]

Evaluates whether two atoms are the same in a given internal coordinate. Two indices are given relative with internal coordinate numbering. For example, suppose you have two bond angles in methane: a1 = H2-C1-H3, a2 = H3-C1-H4. a1[0] = H2, a1[1] = C1, a1[2] = H3, a2[0] = H3, a2[1] = C1, a2[2] = H4 in the inernal coordinate numbering scheme. The method returns the following:
matches(0,0) = false
matches(1,1) = true
matches(2,0) = true
matches(2,2) = false

Parameters:
id1 Atom index in coordinate 1
id2 Atom index in coordinate 2
at Returns the atom if a match is found
